column_description: The field "gml_id" is used to record the ID of the water system
column_description_CN: 字段"gml_id"用于记录该水系的ID

column_description: The field "Name" is used to record the name of the water system, and water systems with different "gml_id" may share the same name
column_description_CN: 字段"Name"用于记录该水系的名字，"gml_id"不同的水系，名字有可能相同
